description.en:
Arimura Rin, high school first year. The start of her idolized high school life. Or so she thought! But her class is filled with delinquents, so she only has days filled with fear. On top of that, she ended up pissing off Igarashi Chiaki, an eye-patched boy who snaps when provoked! It’s so not an atmosphere for romance! Even so, she promised her ex-classmates from middle school that she’ll introduce her boyfriend to them, so now she’s in a real pinch! This is a love story about a cheerful girl who sucks at love, but she’ll also make you laugh, cry and feel cheered up!

Includes oneshots:
Anna-chan no Wana
Iroha ni Ai wo (Love to Iroha)
